author: Phil Vickery
method: Preheat the grill to medium. Place the eggs into a bowl, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and beat well. Add the salmon, butter beans and rocket and mix well. Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Pour the egg mixture into the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes, until the base is golden-brown and the frittata is almost set. Place the frittata under the grill and cook for a few minutes, until golden-brown on top and completely set. To serve, cut the frittata into wedges and place onto serving plates.
ingredients: 4 free-range eggs ,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 tin salmon,  50g/1Â½oz canned butter beans, rinsed and drained,  small bunch rocket,  1 tbsp olive oil
